views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

A simple tweak to round the thumbnail corners on the YouTube app. The tweak also narrows the thumbnails in the main-view.

All options can be enabled/disabled from the preference panel.

Tested and compiled on an iPhone 6S, iOS 12.1.1, unc0ver v3.2.1.
YouTube v14.32.8

Not yet compiled for arm64e (until a solution arises to compile on-device).

Want to buy me a drink? (or a car?)... donations greatly appreciated.

Donate:
Email: nicksb2013@gmail.com
Reddit: u/NickSB2013.

Configure options from Settings.

Updated preference bundle naming convention.
iOS 11 and 12 compatible (not arm64e until an on-device method to compile is released).
